Sentence.sentence: Medical spending, which typically rises faster than wages and the overall economy, is propelled by two things: the high prices charged for medical services in this country and the volume of unnecessary care delivered by doctors and hospitals, which often perform a lot more tests and treatments than a patient really needs.
Sentence.come: 出自-2016年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Both bills would reduce the rate of growth in annual Medicare payments to hospitals, nursing homes and other providers by amounts comparable to the productivity savings routinely made in other industries with the help of new technologies and new ways to organize work.
Sentence.come: 出自-2016年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Overall, stress-related health problems account for up to 90% of hospital visits, many of them preventable.
Sentence.come: 出自-2016年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Martin Samuels at a Boston hospital.
Sentence.come: 出自-2015年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Migrants to cities are attracted by plentiful jobs, access to hospitals and education, and the ability to escape the boredom of a farmer's agricultural life.
Sentence.come: 出自-2013年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Surgeons may survive the robot invasion, but others at the hospital might not be so lucky, as iRobot, maker of the Roomba, a robot vacuum cleaner, has been showing off Ava, which could be used as a messenger in a hospital.
Sentence.come: 出自-2012年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Gary, my assistant is in hospital now.
Sentence.come: 出自-2013年6月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: Hospital workers in at least one case deserted their workplace in panic, thus halting the administering of potentially unclean disease spreading injections, but Ebola has not disappeared
Sentence.come: 出自-2013年6月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: The woman will have to stay in hospital for a few days.
Sentence.come: 出自-2013年6月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: Both strains quickly invaded local hospitals when needle sharing and other unhealthy practices ensured the rapid spreading of the infection by bringing people into contact with contaminated body fluids.
Sentence.come: 出自-2013年6月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: Many hospitals and centers help patients cope
Sentence.come: 出自-2013年6月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: Paul Phillips, an expert from the High Field Hospital.
Sentence.come: 出自-2013年6月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: I can't seem to get anyone in the hospital to listen to my complaints and this outdated equipment is dangerous.
Sentence.come: 出自-2012年12月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: The head technician in the lab tried to persuade the hospital administration to replace it, but they are trying to cut costs
Sentence.come: 出自-2012年12月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: Poor management of the hospital.
Sentence.come: 出自-2012年12月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: This responsibility takes her to many different places every week——the police station, the court and the hospital.
Sentence.come: 出自-2011年6月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: A lot of the government advertising has been about individual responsibility, but actually understanding that drinking is very much about the social activity and finding ways to help young people get home safely and not end up in hospital is one of the th
Sentence.come: 2017年6月六级真题（第二套）听力 Section C

Sentence.sentence: During a month-long hospital trial,researchers asked 70 patients how they felt being around the robot and "only three or four said they didn't like having it around".
Sentence.come: 2018年12月六级真题（第二套）阅读 Section C

Sentence.sentence: In 2014, one in sixteen Americans visited the hospital emergency room for home injuries.
Sentence.come: 2019年12月六级真题（第一套）听力 Section B

Sentence.sentence: Kristi King, a diet specialist at Texas Children's Hospital, finds it's hard to get teenager patients' attention about healthy eating.
Sentence.come: 2017年6月六级真题（第二套）听力 Section B

Sentence.sentence: Last year, a child was born at a hospital in the UK with her heart outside her body.
Sentence.come: 2019年12月六级真题（第二套）阅读 Section C

Sentence.sentence: Overall, stress-related health problems account for up to 90% of hospital visits, many of them preventable .
Sentence.come: 2016年12月六级真题（第一套）阅读 Section B

Sentence.sentence: Toyohashi University of Technology has developed Terapio, a robotic medical cart that can make hospital rounds, deliver medications and other items, and retrieve records.
Sentence.come: 2018年12月六级真题（第二套）阅读 Section C

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表名词"人,物,状态"; 2. 地方; 3. 表形容词,"……的"

stems_affixes.word_buile: mur墙壁+al人,物,状态→adj.墙壁的 n.壁画
riv=river+al人,物,状态→竞争
affection爱;感情+al……的→adj.情感上的,爱情的
agriculture农业+al……的→adj.农业的,农艺的
clinic临床+al……的→adj.临床的,病房用的
con共同+gen出生+it+al……的→与生俱来
continent大陆+al……的→adj.大陆的,大陆性的

word_mean: 医院：治病的机构。“该机构应地点适宜，有相应的建筑、设备、组织管理及各类人员，能为预防、诊断和治疗各种躯体的、精神的疾病以及为社会性疾病在医疗方面提供科学的，经济的，有效的和不受妨碍的服务所需的一切
利用医院的职能设施可开展许多特殊的专业、技术和经济领域人员的培训，并加强与医师、其他医院、医学院和所有被认可的卫生机构的密切联系。”——美国医学教育委员会

Sentence.sentence: Another study of 302 volunteers at hospitals in Chicago focused on individual differences in the degree to which people view "volunteer" as an important social role.
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语江苏卷 阅读理解 阅读C 原文

Sentence.sentence: Fortunately, after a brief stay in hospital, Ben was well enough to be allowed to leave and later the family met up for dinner.
Sentence.come: 2018年高考英语全国卷2 完形填空 原文

Sentence.sentence: He'd been in and out of the hospital.
Sentence.come: 2017年高考英语全国卷2 阅读理解 阅读B 原文

Sentence.sentence: Hospital patients who see tree branches out their window are likely to recover at a faster rate than patients who see buildings or sky instead.
Sentence.come: 2019年高考英语全国卷I 阅读理解 七选五 原文

Sentence.sentence: I went to see him after he came back from hospital.
Sentence.come: 2016年高考英语全国卷3 完形填空 原文

Sentence.sentence: Much to the family's surprise, Dennis stuck to his promise! He turned up at the hospital bearing gifts for the new mother lindsey and her baby boy.
Sentence.come: 2018年高考英语全国卷3 完形填空 原文

Sentence.sentence: On march 19, Dennis got a group text informing him that a couple he didn't know were at the hospital, waiting for the arrival of a baby.
Sentence.come: 2018年高考英语全国卷3 完形填空 原文

Sentence.sentence: Participants indicated the degree to which the social role mattered by responding to statements such as "volunteering in hospital is an important part of who I am".
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语江苏卷 阅读理解 阅读C 原文

Sentence.sentence: The bus driver never regained consciousness and died at easy surrey hospital.
Sentence.come: 2017年高考英语浙江卷（11月） 完形填空 原文

Sentence.sentence: The hospital has recently obtained new medical equipment, allowing more patients to be treated.
Sentence.come: 2017年高考英语天津卷 单项填空 原文

Sentence.sentence: The walk in the morning before I headed to the hospital was a quiet, peaceful time to gather my thoughts or to just be before the day's medical drama unfolded.
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语浙江卷 阅读理解 阅读D 原文

Sentence.sentence: With that, I spent eight to ten hours a day with Joe in the hospital, doing anything and everything I could to ease his discomfort.
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语浙江卷 阅读理解 阅读D 原文

Sentence.sentence: It Is against that background that the information commissioner, Elizabeth Denham, has issued her damning verdict against the Royal Free hospital trust under the NHS, which handed over to DeepMind the records of 1.
Sentence.come: 出自-2018年考研阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: My own hospital system has banned sugary drinks from its facilities.
Sentence.come: 2014年考研真题（英语二）完形填空 Section Ⅰ

sentences.en: I see a hospital on my right hand.
sentences.cn: 我看到右侧有一所医院。

sentences.en: You must go to hospital today.
sentences.cn: 你今天一定要去看病。</seg>

entry.def: A hospital is a place where people who are ill are looked after by nurses and doctors.

example.tran: 拥有120张病床的儿童医院

example.ex: A couple of weeks later my mother went into hospital...
example.tran: 几周后我母亲住进了医院。

means.word_mean: 1. a health facility where patients receive treatment
2. a medical institution where sick or injured people are given medical or surgical care

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English (in sense 2): via Old French from medieval Latin hospitale, neuter of Latin hospitalis 'hospitable', from hospes, hospit- (see host)

sentences.cn: 医院床位急需增加。
sentences.en: There is an urgent need for more hospital beds.

sentences.cn: 医院医生 / 护士 / 职工
sentences.en: hospital doctors/nurses/staff

sentences.cn: 精神病院
sentences.en: a psychiatric/mental hospital

sentences.cn: 我要去医院探望我弟弟。
sentences.en: I'm going to the hospital to visit my brother.

sentences.cn: 他在医院里去世。
sentences.en: He died in (the) hospital.

sentences.cn: 救护车把伤员火速送往医院。
sentences.en: The injured were rushed to (the) hospital in an ambulance.

sentences.cn: 获准出院
sentences.en: to be discharged from (the) hospital

sentences.en: to be admitted to (the) hospital

sentences.en: A couple of weeks later my mother went into hospital...

sentences.en: ...a children's hospital with 120 beds...

sentences.cn: 我厂愿以过硬的产品质量,实实在在的价格,期待成为您的固定贸易伙伴!
sentences.en: Our factory will become your fixed trade partner dependin on good products quality and price.

sentences.cn: 公立医院源自殖民地时期政府为了救济穷人而建立的救济院中的医务所.
sentences.en: Public general hospital originated in the almshouse infirmaries established as early as colonial times by local governments to care for the poor.

sentences.cn: 我醒来发现自己在医院里.
sentences.en: I woke up to find myself in the hospital.

sentences.cn: 在滥用医院资金问题上,他采取公开的反对态度.
sentences.en: He has taken a public stand on the issue of misuse of hospital funds.

sentences.cn: 你说过去年你住过医院.
sentences.en: You mentioned having been in hospital last year.

sentences.cn: 他 虽然 还住住院, 可是看上去倒挺精神.
sentences.en: He's still in hospital, but he seems quite perky.

sentences.cn: 她在我帮助下抱起那个男孩, 把他送到医院去.⑦(作主语或主语的同位语)我(=I)
sentences.en: She lifted the boy , me helping, and carried him to a hospital.

sentences.cn: 我们迅速将那位生病的妇女送往医院.
sentences.en: We raced the sick woman to hospital.

sentences.cn: 这家医院收到捐赠来的大笔款项.
sentences.en: The hospital receives a good deal of money in donations.

sentences.cn: 医院邻接公园.
sentences.en: The hospital adjoins the park.

sentences.cn: 医院的手术器械必须是消过毒的.
sentences.en: Hospital operating instruments must be sanitary.

sentences.cn: 我是那家医院的一名药剂师.
sentences.en: I am an apothecary of that hospital.

sentences.cn: 公共汽车站离医院很近.
sentences.en: The bus stop is not far from the hospital.

sentences.cn: 他们用一个红十字标出那所医院所在的确切位置.
sentences.en: They marked the exact place of that hospital with a red cross.

sentences.cn: 为了补偿他住院期间的不愉快的经历, 这个人喝多了一点酒.
sentences.en: To compensate for his unpleasant experiences in hospital, the man drank a little more than was good for him.

sentences.cn: 克莱尔出事故住院了,我建议我们募捐些钱买些鲜花去慰问她.
sentences.en: Claire has had an accident and is in hospital so I suggest we pass the hat round to buy her some flowers to cheer her up.

sentences.cn: 他到医院去打听她的情况.
sentences.en: He went to the hospital to inquire about her.

sentences.cn: Kristi King 是得克萨斯州儿童医院的饮食专家，他发现很难让青少年患者注意饮食健康。
sentences.en: Kristi King, a diet specialist at Texas Children’s?Hospital, finds it’s hard to get teenager patients’ attention about healthy eating.
sentences.from: 17年6月六级真题（第二套）| 听力

sentences.cn: 我已经去过几次医院，并进行了两次昂贵的、不舒服的医疗检测，甚至都没有得到确诊。
sentences.en: Several trips to a hospital and two expensive, uncomfortable medical tests had failed to produce even a diagnosis
sentences.from: 18年6月六级真题(第二套)| 听力

sentences.cn: 许多患者还对最开始害得他们住进医院的病症 (35)  有了更清楚的认识。
sentences.en: Many  patients  also 35 gained a better understanding of the illnesses that  landed them in the hospital in the first place.
sentences.from: 16年6月四级真题（第二套）| 阅读

sentences.cn: 克利夫兰诊所是一家医院运营商，已将其医疗人员重组成专注于特定治疗领域的团队；会诊医生、护士还有其他同事紧密合作，不再因专业和等级不同而被分隔开。
sentences.en: The Cleveland Clinic, a hospital operator, has reorganised its medical staff into teams to focus on particular treatment areas; consultants, nurses and others collaborate closely instead of being separated by speciality ( 专业)and rank.
sentences.from: 17年6月四级真题（第三套）| 阅读

sentences.cn: 一条好的经验法则是，一旦将军和医院管理者追随一种管理潮流，就该是发问的时候了。
sentences.en: A good rule of thumb is that as soon as generals and hospital administrators jump on a management bandwagon ( 追随一种管理潮流), it is time to ask questions.
sentences.from: 17年6月四级真题（第三套）| 阅读

sentences.cn: 波士顿布里翰妇女医院的柯克•达夫勒医生表示，50岁以上的人很难快速记住人物、地点和事物的名称，这是十分普遍的。
sentences.en: After age 50, it's quite common to have trouble remembering the names of people，places and things quickly, says Dr. Kirk Daffner of Brigham and Women's Hospital in Boston.
sentences.from: 18年6月四级真题(第二套)| 阅读

sentences.cn: 当 Harper 躺在医院里进行康复治疗时，他设想出了一种产品 —— 美味又健康的冷冻食品。
sentences.en: As he lay in the hospital recovering, Harper imagined a line of healthy frozen foods that tasted good.
sentences.from: 15年12月四级真题（第二套）| 听力

sentences.cn: Charles Harper在医院期间想到了什么？。
sentences.en: What did Charles Harper think of while he was in hospital?.
sentences.from: 15年12月四级真题（第二套）| 听力

sentences.cn: 在空间主动作战和从空间主动作战将司空见惯.
sentences.en: Active combat in space and from space will be no longer unusual.

sentences.cn: 这家医院现在都是叫病人的名字而不是叫病例号.
sentences.en: The hospital now refers to patients by name, not case number.

sentences.cn: 42%.影响医院业务收入的因素包括:年份 、 医院、奖金类型.
sentences.en: Thefactorsaffecting hospital service revenue included : year of calculation, hospital and bonus type.

sentences.cn: 制定医院发展战略首先需要掌握战略分析方法.
sentences.en: It is imperative to possess strategic analysis Methods : When formulating hospital development strategy.

sentences.cn: 他的话使全医院为之寒心.
sentences.en: His speech cast a chill over the hospital.

sentences.cn: 目的: 阐述药品分类管理制度对医院药剂科的影响.
sentences.en: Objective : To discuss the influence of drug classification system on hospital pharmacy.

sentences.cn: 国家卫生局负责医院的管理工作.
sentences.en: The state board of health is responsible for hospital management.

sentences.cn: 他从发生事故之后,一直在医院.
sentences.en: He's been in hospital since his accident.

sentences.cn: 一个礼拜中,史密斯医生每天去不同的医院.
sentences.en: Dr. Smith goes to a different hospital every day of the week.

sentences.cn: 社会主义市场经济的确立, 医院医德医风情况发生了新的变化.
sentences.en: With the establishment of socialism market economy, it bring about new change to hospital ethics situation.

sentences.cn: 公立医院源自殖民地时期政府为了救济穷人而建立的救济院中的医务所.
sentences.en: Public general hospital originated in the almshouse infirmaries established as early as colonial times by local governments to care for the poor.

sentences.cn: 由于他有肾衰竭,我们必须火速送他去医院.
sentences.en: We had to rush him to the hospital because of kidney failure.

sentences.cn: 教堂, 学校, 医院, 收容所或监狱皆属公共机构.
sentences.en: A church, school, hospital, asylum, or prison is an institution.

sentences.cn: 这样得来的利润就捐献给某一个慈善组织, 学校 、 医院或养老院.
sentences.en: Profits in these cases are donated to particular charity, school, hospital or home for the aged.

Sentence.sentence: The Cleveland Clinic, a hospital operator, has reorganised its medical staff into teams to focus on particular treatment areas; consultants, nurses and others collaborate closely instead of being separated by speciality ( ' ,  专业) and rank.
